H0.text: Binary fission is the best example of sexual reproduction.

H1.text: Budding is the best example of sexual reproduction.

H2.text: Fusing gametes is the best example of sexual reproduction.

H3.text: Fragmentation is the best example of sexual reproduction.

A4.text: a gamete (haploid reproductive cells, such as a sperm or egg cell) with a single set of chromosomes combines with another gamete to produce a zygote

A5.text: Sexual reproduction does not occur in prokaryotes, unicellular organisms without cell nuclei, such as bacteria and archaea.
